node.title: 'Wake-up call' for Gold Coast, Southern Downs after new community COVID cases detected in Queensland
node.description: Two people in the south-east corner have tested positive after potentially being infectious in the community for several days. One case is also detected in hotel quarantine in a person that arrived from Melbourne.
node.content:
["Queensland has recorded three\u00a0new cases of COVID-19, Premier Annastacia Palaszczuk says.", "A 32-year-old man, who had\u00a0had one dose of a vaccine, has contracted the virus on the Gold Coast and was in the community for six\u00a0days while infectious.", "The man's\u00a0three close-contact\u00a0family members, one of whom is a health worker, have so far tested negative.", "Another case, which was\u00a0detected at Warwick on the Southern Downs, has been infectious in the community for 10 days.", "The unvaccinated First Nation's person\u00a0attended an event in Moree that had been linked to other known cases.", "One case has also been detected in hotel quarantine, in a person that arrived from Melbourne.", "The Premier stressed unvaccinated Queenslanders could not wait any longer to get the jab.", "\"I've been very clear if we see a large community outbreak in any of those areas [that have low vaccination rates]\u00a0we will have to look at putting in place some restrictions,\" she said.", "\"Like I said we're quite comfortable at the moment because the vaccination rates are higher than they were two or three months ago and it's a wait and see here, but it is a wake-up call for people in Warwick, for people on the Gold Coast to go and get vaccinated.", "\"Time is running out.\"", "
Anyone working in or going to health facilities must be vaccinated
", "Queensland will mandate vaccination for all people working or using any health facility in the state.", "People who want to work or go to a GP, private hospital, physiotherapist\u00a0or any other health service must be fully vaccinated from December 17, unless they have a valid exemption.", "The government said the mandate\u00a0was\u00a0to ensure people have confidence they have protection when visiting healthcare facilities.", "The Premier yesterday outlined rules that only double-dosed people can visit or work in hospitality and entertainment venues from December 17.", "Queensland Health Minister Yvette D'Ath has also clarified rules around people coming to the state from that date.", "Travellers must be fully vaccinated and have a negative COVID PCR test within the previous 72 hours.", "For the purpose of people coming into the state from a hotspot, fully vaccinated means having a second dose at least two weeks prior to entering the state.", "
People concerned about COVID vaccine should see GP, Premier says
", "", "
Ms\u00a0Palaszczuk said people worried about getting the vaccine should talk to a health professional.(ABC News: Owen Jacques)
", "The Premier is in Cherbourg meeting with local representatives in an effort to boost Indigenous vaccination rates.", "Deputy Chief Health Officer\u00a0Lynne McKinlay urged people to check the Queensland Health website and stay up-to-date with contact tracing sites.", "\"We will be posting if there are any exposure sites that you need to be concerned about or if you've been to those locations,\" she said.", "\"Please do go and get tested if you're in the Gold Coast or in the Warwick area or have been a south of the border into that Moree area, if you have any symptoms at all.", "\"There's going to probably be a new testing site set up at Warwick as well today, in addition to the seven or so other sites that are available to you, and there's plenty of testing availability as well on the Gold Coast.\"", "Cherbourg Mayor Elvie Sandow said the were two main reasons for the town's low vaccination rate.", "\"Religious reasons and social media doesn't help, so it's our job to make it happen,\" Ms Sandow said.", "Ms Palaszczuk said people worried about the vaccine should consult a health professional.", "\"If you have any concerns, please go and see the experts, go and see your local GP or see a nurse, there are people there that can talk through any issues that you may have,\" she said.", "\"This virus is coming. I need to keep you safe and Queenslanders need to continue to unite to ensure that we can get through this as smoothly as possible.\"", "Ms Palaszczuk said those objecting to the vaccine for religious reasons should consider the risks.", "\"I ask people to think long and hard about this. This is about protecting you and your family,\" she said.", "\"I understand they're tough decisions, but it's protecting you, your family and your community.\"", "", "
Outbreak: How Australia lost control of the Delta variant
"]
